name: Dive Bar
description:
GAMEPLAY:

Joe's Crab Shack has converted part of their restaurant into a Dive Bar to capitalize on the night life. You find they have an opening for a bouncer with only one requirement: let in the VIPs and keep out those will ill-intent. Thing is, the boss has not given you clear instructions on who is who and it is up to you to figure that out.

CONTROLS:

Mouse - Click choices

NOTES: 
  • If you do not pick a choice, the previous sentence will build onto the other.
